forum.content:
古典與現代的完美結合!

在Michael Bibl'e 動人的歌聲伴著吉他聲!鋼琴聲!小提琴在後半段混合進來時...一層一層的把情緒堆到最高點!

我很喜歡!

urls.description: I Believe in You by Michael Bublé from the new album 'Nobody But Me' available now! Buy or Download

forum.title: 令人驚艷的"I believe in you!"
